question:
Consider the following statements about the Pravasi Kaushal Vikas Yojana:
  1. The scheme will be implemented by the National Skill Development Corporation (NSDC)
  2. The scheme aims to provide skills to Indian youth seeking overseas employment
  3. The scheme is applicable for residents as well as non-residents Indians
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: All given statements are correct Pravasi Kaushal Vikas Yojana (PKVY) is a skill development program that aims to provide training to Indian youth seeking overseas employment. It was launched after inauguration of 14th Pravasi Bhartiya Divas convention at Indiaâ€™s IT hub Bengaluru, Karnataka. Under this programme government announced the launch of 50 India International Skill Centres in partnership between skill development and entrepreneurship ministry and ministry of external affairs to impart training to youth. The scheme is being implemented by the National Skill Development Corporation. Pravasi Kaushal Vikas Yojana will benefit residents as well as non-resident Indians.
